data.title: William Moroney on LinkedIn: Tesselate Group
data.meta_description:
Great to learn that Tesselate, a leading provider of services and integration in #corporatebanking, is now on Temenos Exchange!

Their hive.t interoperability…
data.text:
Start modernizing your Temenos hashtag#CoreBanking platform with the Temenos LEAP program supported by LTIMindtree Banking Transformation Practice (ex. Syncordis). LEAP offers Temenos clients a fast, low-risk route to a modern hashtag#cloud-native architecture to future-proof your business. Meet the LTIMIndtree Migration and Quality Assurance specialists and start your hashtag#digitaltransformation journey here: hashtag#LEAPwithLTIMindtree

Temenos is an exciting place to work, and our biggest asset is our talented workforce. By promoting innovation and collaboration and investing in our team's development, we attract and retain top talent, ensuring continued customer success. Congratulations to our 12 #Temenosian graduates who completed the relaunched Pre-Sales Practitioners Soft Skills Training Course! This intensive week-long event, held at our Bucharest office, revolved around sessions with Dave Bakker from Solutions by Interact, complemented by our own expert coaches and trainers. Well done, and best wishes to everyone on their journey. Lemon drizzle cake will never taste the same again!

The explosion of digital banks changed the dynamics of the banking industry and forced traditional banks to catch up with the digital revolution to stay relevant, as Aspire Systems Senior Director, APAC, Vasudevan Subramanian, shares. Read his article to learn how these three key factors, #GenerativeAI, #openbanking, and #ESG, will craft the next-generation #digitalbanking experience: https://lnkd.in/dQ88uama

Finextra TV sat down with Temenos President Americas Rodrigo Silva and EVP & CFO at Commerce Bank Charles Kim to explore the path towards #digitaltransformation and the challenges banks need to overcome as part of the modernization journey. Watch the video to hear how Temenos and Commerce replaced 30+-year-old #corebanking and #payments systems across the bank: https://lnkd.in/d98qBSur #TCF2024

CreditAccess Grameen Limited is the largest #microfinance institution in India. Over the past four years, it has seen 22% growth year-on-year. It was also the first microfinance company in India to understand the benefits of deploying a #corebanking platform. Thanks to Temenos' scalable platform, CreditAccess Grameen can offer many more financial services to low-income and rural households. The organization now processes 90,000 loan applications per day. Learn more here: https://lnkd.in/dA_9Wpra #VoiceOfCustomer

Are you ready to elevate your bank’s defense against fraud with the latest from Temenos and Transmit Security? Join us for a webinar that will empower you with the tools to win the battle against fraud. During the session, you will learn from real case studies and demonstrations of the following capabilities: • Real-time fraud detection examples with BOT, Malware, and Automation Framework recognition • Easy to configure customer journeys with Low/No-Code Orchestration tools. • The next generation of Passwordless authentication Register now: https://lnkd.in/gJjp6XXb

O-Bank is Taiwan’s first digital-native bank, and launched its retail banking business within 12 months! The bank is committed to sustainability and is focused on delivering #innovative #finserv products that create win-win outcomes and mutual prosperity for consumers. Leveraging Temenos #corebanking, O-Bank has grown to over half a million customers and $21billion USD in assets. The bank can launch new products in just three or four days. Learn more here: https://lnkd.in/dnXkdmjX #VoiceOfCustomer

Watch this webinar on "Diversifying Cross-border Payments for Growth," where Temenos specialists and industry leaders discuss key regulations and trends in cross-border #payments across MEA. Learn how banks diversify their transaction settlement options, from SWIFT's CBPR+ to #fintech solutions, and explore the future of blockchain networks and #digitalcurrencies. Don't miss out on insights and practical advice to navigate the evolving financial landscape: https://lnkd.in/dDdFMnyt

The question for Banque Internationale à Luxembourg (BIL) was: what is the best route to developing new services and bringing them to market? As the oldest bank in Luxembourg, BIL had accumulated 30 years of layer upon layer of legacy technology. This compromised the bank’s ability to innovate. BIL decided to go for a 'big bang' deployment, launching Temenos #corebanking, #payments and #wealth technology on the same day. Learn how this project made BIL more customer-centric across its retail, corporate and private banking business lines here: https://lnkd.in/dCCGDH_P #VoiceOfCustomer

Bimal Gandhi, Uniken's Chief Executive Officer, says that the hallmark of #finserv has always been fulfilling customers' daily financial needs. In his article, Bimal describes how established banks are increasingly focusing on operational efficiency to improve their bottom line driven by a concerted effort to enhance the #customerexperience, a vital factor in driving top-line growth. As the banking and #payments industry continues to evolve, learn how financial institutions can adapt to the changes: https://lnkd.in/dfM_2qDe
